name: Ragdoll Destroyer
description:
Ragdoll Destroyer is a physics-based game where your goal is to destroy a ragdoll character! Customize the ragdoll to your liking, select a room, and let the fun begin. Doing more damage to the ragdoll will help you unlock more tools in your toolbox. Tools include a crusher, cannon, rocket launcher, spikes, and more.

Players have lots of customization options. They can adjust the player's size, color, clothing, gender, and even face. Players can load custom images to use as character faces.

Will you blow your ragdoll up? Light him on fire? Toss him into traffic? The choice is yours.
